sentences.en: ...the two fundamentally opposed social systems, capitalism and socialism.
sentences.cn: …两种根本对立的社会制度，资本主义与社会主义。

sentences.en: Any day now the whole of European capitalism may crash.
sentences.cn: 整个欧洲资本主义马上就会分崩瓦解.

sentences.en: Capitalism began to develop in Russia in the 19 th century.
sentences.cn: 十九世纪资本主义在俄国开始发展.

sentences.en: Capitalism is an exceedingly broad and somewhat vague term.
sentences.cn: 资本主义这一名词过分广泛而且有点模糊不清.

sentences.en: Capitalism stresses innovation, competition and individualism.
sentences.cn: 资本主义强调的是创新、竞争和个人至上。

sentences.en: He rails against the iniquities of capitalism.
sentences.cn: 他怒斥资本主义的种种罪恶。

sentences.en: His article is, predictably, a scathing attack on capitalism.
sentences.cn: 可想而知，他的文章是对资本主义的严厉抨击。

sentences.en: Imperialism is monopolistic, parasitic and moribund capitalism.
sentences.cn: 帝国主义是垄断的 、 寄生的、垂死的资本主义.

sentences.en: It exposes capitalism in the raw.
sentences.cn: 它暴露了资本主义的本来面目。

sentences.en: It is the jungle law of capitalism.
sentences.cn: 这正是资本主义弱肉强食的规律.

sentences.en: Marx and Engels scientifically forecast the collapse of capitalism.
sentences.cn: 马克思和恩格斯科学地预言了资本主义的灭亡.

sentences.en: Offe also challenges the postulate of an "organized capitalism".
sentences.cn: 奥费也质疑“有组织的资本主义”的假设。

sentences.en: The essence of his argument is that capitalism cannot succeed.
sentences.cn: 他的论点的核心是资本主义不能成功.

sentences.en: Their new manifesto hardly threatens to bring the whole edifice of capitalism crashing down.
sentences.cn: 他们新的宣言声称要摧毁整个资本主义大厦，这是不可能的。

sentences.en: This is a basic tenet of capitalism.
sentences.cn: 这是资本主义的一则基本信条.

words.tran_cn: 首都，省会；资金；大写字母；资本家
资本化；资本总额；用大写
用大写字母书写；投资于
使资本化；以大写字母写；估计…的价值

phrases.tran_cn: 裙带资本主义；权贵资本主义；唯亲资本主义

trans.tran_en: an economic and political system in which businesses belong mostly to private owners, not to the government
